summary: Adds Warscream a gladiator and Glamour a cleric standalone followers
descriptionHtml:
[b]THIS IS MY FIRST TRUE MOD.[/b]
I used to play Aion Online and after 6 years i left the game, but i love my characters so much and miss them a lot.
Because of that i decided to create them in skyrim as followers to help me on my adventures!
They require all DLCs and Last Update.
No they do not require any mod.
[size=4][b]Warscream can be found in The Castledour in Solitude.
Glamour can be found in the temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.

They Are Designed To Level Up With You Infinitely and Fight Anything Even At Legendary Difficulty.
The Same Goes To Stormwing Who Can Be Summoned By Warscream.
[size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3]Warscream Will Take The Front Line And Shout Violently(She does like to shout a lot)[/size][size=3]and Fight In Melee Combat, But You Can Give Her a Bow If You Want.[/size][b]

[/b][size=3]Glamour Will Heal You In Combat When Your Health Drops and Can Summon a Healing Mother That Deals Ice Damage and Will Heal You If Glamour Is Unable To Act.[/size][b]
[/b][/size]

We're Warscream and Glamour, nord daevas!

Though trouble may follow us, we overcome it with dignity and strenght.
Talos and Kynareth, Our Gods Deities, teaches us that there's a time for action and a time for thought.

We work hard to maintain our physical strenght and prowess. And yet in the past, we have been defeated. We wagered war against dragon lord Tiamat. Who Killed Our Parents When We Where Only Infants.
We where overconfident, but are now determined to slay her and free skyrim.

We wear no helm on the battlefield. Because of this, our enemies tremble when they see the fearless determination in our eyes.
While We Have Each Other We Can Survive Anything!

Through Our Quest To Become Stronger We Met a Mighty Dragon Named Stormwing.
We fought! We Battled! And With Power Combined The Beast Was Defeated!
His Soul Was Sealed Within Warscream So She Can Summon Him In Our Time Of Need!

With Time, Stormwing Teached us The Dovah's Language and We Learned To Shout.
[b]Warscream[/b] Learned To Use Unrelenting Force, To Disarm Her Enemies, and Use The Dragons's Mighty Breath!
[b]Glamour[/b] Can Blow Her Enemies In To Mid Air With Strong Cyclones and Manipulate The Violent Storms!

We Also Crafted Our Unique Powerful Weapons To Fight Those Majestic Creatures.

[b]The Legionnaire[/b]: Warscream's Migthy Greatsword That Deals Extra Damage Against Dragons and Allows Her To Become a Dragon Aspect When She Deals Devastating Critical Attacks!

[b]DragonBreaker[/b]: Glamour's Holy Mace, Also Deals Extra Damage Against Dragons and Buffs Her Allies With Call To Arms, Making Them Stronger!
[i][b]
This is Our Story.
[/b][/i]
author: Chendu2
